titleStmt.title: [The A B C with the catechism that is to saie, the instruction ... to be learned of euerie childe.]

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Purfoot for th' assignes of Richard Day. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis. Forbidding all other to print this catechisme,

notesStmt.note: With a woodcut of a nativity scene on A8v.
Reproduction of original in the Peterhouse College Library, Cambridge, England.
